name: Digging Day
description:
Digging Day is a cute and simple game where you play as 1 of 5 characters and work on a farm.


  • Clean up the farm.
  • Find and Plant Seeds.
  • Harvest Items
  • Sell Items at your Produce Stands
  • Purchase a Produce Store
  • Purchase a Restaurant.
  • Cook/Craft Food Items.
  • Sell Food Items
  • and more.....

         

Created by: @JustWallGames
Music by @JustWallGames
Additional Concept by: @NoProPlayer
Additional Concept and Concept Art by: Kaelie (My 6 year old daughter)
Lead Tester: @alWirehead

 

Controls:

A Message from the Developer:

Games are an Idea and then Execution.  When the streamer NoPro said "You should make a Farming Game with a Store and a Restaurant!" I said "Ok."  Then my daughter was drawing me kid pictures of what she wanted in the game.  She wanted a Unicorn, Bunny, Cow and so many more things.  She also said "NoPro should be the player."  I made all of this happen.  This is by no means a "Stardew" experience, yet a different take on the genre.  I could never live up to the mighty "Eric."  I love making games and this game re-inspired me.  I was in a bit of a rut and dig out by getting really into making this game.  It is fun and chill.  I hope you enjoy it as much as I do.

  

Life is Short = Be Creative
